doc.field: 3 management textbooks and 2 on reading skills. Spadafora's desk notepad. Print matter "How to be successful on oral assessment exercises for police promotion." Parking violations pad with summons/defendants listed, circa 1984-89. Hazardous Material Mitigation Comparison material: reference materials, materials acquired from various fire depts globally, including Tokyo, floppies, etc: all this appears to be in relation to a project management course taken by Spadafora for the Fire Officers Management Institute. Firefighter benefits info (1981). 100 MB zip drive labeled with post-it "DAC Spadafora". Promotion to battalion chief course material (Spadafora taking it). Tutorial exercise "Rems" for taking deputy chief's test, 1988. (Includes digital formats)
